subject: Pro x pedals
description_text:
Hi, I was reaching out to say that I’m trying to get my pedals canceled. I
ordered the wrong one so I’m trying to get the pro X ultra instead.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ohma Tokita,    We apologize, but your order has already been shipped. We will do our best to intercept the pedals package, though success is not guaranteed. Thank you for your understanding. Please send us a screenshot show which Pro X Ultra model you'd like to exchange for and its price. We will process any price difference by refunding the excess or charging the shortfall.

Yeah, I was trying to cancel it before it did. That’s why I sent a message
These are the pedals that I really want

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025 at 4:43 AM service@simsonn.com

I was trying to get it with the base and everything since im still getting
a rig for it and i really loved the way the rgb looked with the plate and
pedals

Hi Ohma Tokita,     We intercepted your order yesterday and have not yet received a response. Once the interception is confirmed, we will modify your order accordingly.  Additionally, do you require the Pro X Ultra baseplate?

Yes, I’m very sorry. I thought the response went through and yes, I am
trying to acquire the petal plate as well with the RGB pedals. I thought my
message went through earlier.

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025 at 9:57 PM service@simsonn.com

Again, thank you for your help.  Been looking for pedals nonstop and then I
saw you guys as an option with the whole deal you guys got going on. It was
hard to pass but i had gotten the wrong ones

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025 at 9:57 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Ohma Tokita,     Your parcel appears to have been successfully intercepted. Please confirm that the specifications you require are as shown in the image below. We shall dispatch your order as soon as possible.

Yes

On Tue, Nov 18, 2025 at 3:42 AM service@simsonn.com
Thats the pedals i want and does it cone with the baseplate?

Hi Ohma Tokita,    We have shipped the version without the base plate to you. If you require the base plate, a $70 difference will be charged. Additionally, intercepting and replacing the product will incur a $21.40 shipping fee.  ​https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/no-results-found?trknbr=886186822116

All right, That’s fine and I wanted to know if I can get a tracking number

On Wed, Nov 19, 2025 at 6:48 AM service@simsonn.com
Will it be coming in today?

Hi Ohma Tokita,    We apologize for the delayed response—we've been extremely busy lately. The link in our previous email is your shipment tracking link. Additionally, you can click this link to pay the shipping fees. Thank you for your understanding.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

OK, well I was trying to cancel it at first Before it even shipped out
Before it became a problem thank you again for your help, but I can just
send back the haptics and cancel the order

On Fri, Nov 21, 2025 at 6:09 AM service@simsonn.com

Paid. the difference how long will it take to get shipped?

On Fri, Nov 21, 2025 at 6:09 AM service@simsonn.com

And I wanted to know if the $70 would get on top of my total that I’m
paying off or I have to Pay separately because I need the base

Hi Ohma Tokita,    The Plus X product you originally purchased was priced at $461.30. The Pro X Ultra P3-H3 we shipped to you without the base plate costs $470.80—a difference of only a few dollars, so no additional payment is required. However, the Pro X Ultra P3-H3 with the base plate is priced at $534.90, resulting in a price difference of $72.60. We appreciate your understanding.

Not yet I perfectly understand. I just wanted to know if it would get added
on top or I’m gonna have to pay separately. I don’t mind. I just want to
know. As of right now, I would like to know when my pedals will get
shipped, thank you for the help and sorry for the inconvenience

On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 4:01 AM service@simsonn.com
